SEARCH
Package hms.boundary.doctor

Class UpdatePatientMedicalRecordView

java.lang.Object
hms.boundary.View
hms.boundary.doctor.UpdatePatientMedicalRecordView
Direct Known Subclasses:
CompleteAppointmentView
public class UpdatePatientMedicalRecordView extends View
The UpdatePatientMedicalRecordView class is responsible for handling user input and displaying options for updating patient medical records, including adding prescriptions, adding or setting consultation notes, and handling appointment records.

      Returns:
